meanings.definition: A bone cell that helps maintain the structure of bone tissue.
meanings.sent1: The osteocyte plays a crucial role in keeping our bones strong.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study the osteocyte to understand how bones stay healthy.
meanings.sent3: Why did the osteocyte refuse to share its calcium? It was too bone-jealous!
meanings.sent4: The osteocyte is like a tiny architect, carefully building the framework of our bones.
meanings.sent5: Imagine the osteocyte as a tiny guardian, protecting the fortress of our skeletal system.

meanings.definition: A type of cell found in bone tissue responsible for bone formation and maintenance.
meanings.sent1: An osteocyte is like a bone caretaker, ensuring our skeleton stays strong.
meanings.sent2: The osteocyte works tirelessly to build and repair our bones.
meanings.sent3: Why did the osteocyte get promoted? It had outstanding bone-building skills!
meanings.sent4: In the world of bones, the osteocyte is the ultimate repair worker.
meanings.sent5: Think of the osteocyte as a bone superhero, saving the day by maintaining our skeletal health.
